data.persona: I sell and trade items to earn money. I am not royalty. I live in villages and can travel far distances.
data.description:
You are in the Laundry Lines.
The laundry lines extend for meters. 6 rows of lines go from north to south. The area is filled with people putting their clothes to dry. All the lines are in an opening of trees that the sun hits perfectly to help dry. To the right you can see a stream through the tree where people go to wash their clothes before they hang them to dry.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shoe and a rope, and wielding a money.

data.short_motivation: I want to get money from the purse
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the money in the purse to get better items for my shop
data.long_motivation: I want to become known as one of the greatest merchants in the land, with the best inventory

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go market to buy good with money in purse

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get customers who want my goods
